title: Kansas Hillshade (derived from 1-m DEM)
description: Shaded-relief raster for Kansas generated from the 1-m DEM (USGS 3DEP/DASC). Prepared as a Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFF for fast web rendering.

processing.source_crs_note: If DEM is in projected meters, keep zfactor=1. For geographic degrees, set zfactor to meters/degree at latitude or reproject before hillshade.
commands_example: gdal_translate ks_hillshade.tif ks_hillshade_cog.tif -of COG -co COMPRESS=DEFLATE -co NUM_THREADS=ALL_CPUS -co OVERVIEWS=IGNORE_EXISTING

endpoints.notes: Local COG output produced by the processing steps. Serve directly in the web viewer.

lineage: Converted to COG with internal overviews
notes: Update checksum and filesize after generating the COG. If using tiled statewide mosaics, create multiple items or a tile index.
